channel.title: Comments misbehaving on SoundCloud?
channel.description:
Getting some iffy behaviour with comments on SoundCloud for the past couple of days.
Sometimes, a comment I'm adding doesn't appear to register, so I make it again – and then, later, both appear.
Similarly, I'm getting double notifications for some comments left on my tracks.
  Just me or are others getting this issue?
  P.S. Do you know if it's possible to disable notifications when I reply to a comment on my own tracks? (Doesn't appear to be an option in the notifications settings.)

item.title: Comments misbehaving on SoundCloud?
item.dc:creator: Arimyth
item.description:
It happens to everyone. SoundCloud can be a bit dicey when it comes to perfectly displaying comments and notifications, but it’s a tradeoff for the mostly smooth, disco like (and other sites that utilize AJAX to a high degree) feel.

Read full topic
